English.Char_Desc_80: Compact application designed to create Java installers using IzPack
English.Char_Desc_250: Open source application to generate Java installers, using IzPack, for a set of packages and applications.
English.Char_Desc_450:
Great and powerful application to generate stable and multi-platform Java installers.
Its intuitive UI and exceptional ease of use makes it very easy to build complex installers with large amounts of files. The whole process is done step by step through a wizard-like interface, filling in fields and setting up files to finally build your package.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Open source application that generates Java installers, using IzPack, for a set of packages and applications as executable jar file.
It is mainly about creating installers for what you need quickly and efficiently, following 3 simple steps: Scan, Set and Tweak to Build your package.
1 - Scan the directory containing the files you want to include in your package. 2 - Set the parameters for your packs, including what depends on what, what is required, what must be executed... 3 - Tweak the final custom settings for your application to be ready.
